hero.title: Drive transformational change
hero.subtitle: We partner with Fortune 500 companies and global enterprises to solve complex business challenges. From digital transformation to operational excellence, our consultants deliver measurable results that drive sustainable growth.

about.title: Strategic Excellence
about.subtitle: Trusted by global leaders
about.content: With 20+ years of experience across industries, Strategic Solutions Group brings deep expertise in corporate strategy, digital transformation, and organizational change. Our team of former C-suite executives and industry specialists delivers insights that move markets.

products.name: Digital Transformation
products.description: End-to-end digital strategy including technology roadmap, organizational change, and implementation support. 12-week engagement.

products.name: M&A Due Diligence
products.description: Comprehensive acquisition analysis including market assessment, synergy identification, and integration planning.

products.name: Operational Excellence
products.description: Process optimization, cost reduction, and performance improvement programs. Data-driven recommendations.

products.name: Growth Strategy
products.description: Market entry, product strategy, and revenue acceleration. Includes competitive analysis and go-to-market plan.

products.name: Change Management
products.description: Organizational transformation support including stakeholder engagement and implementation roadmap.

products.name: Executive Advisory
products.description: Monthly retainer for ongoing strategic counsel. Direct access to senior partners.

items.text: Strategic Solutions Group led our digital transformation with precision and insight. Their team delivered beyond expectations, and the results speak for themselves - 40% efficiency gain in 12 months.
items.author: James Richardson
items.title: CTO, Fortune 500 Retailer

items.text: The M&A due diligence they conducted was thorough and insightful. Their analysis uncovered key synergies that made the acquisition highly successful.
items.author: Maria Santos
items.title: VP Corporate Development

items.text: Working with SSG transformed our approach to growth strategy. Their market insights and strategic framework drove a 25% revenue increase year-over-year.
items.author: David Chang
items.title: CEO, Tech Company

members.name: Dr. Michael Bradford
members.title: Managing Partner
members.bio: Former Chief Strategy Officer at a Fortune 100 company. PhD in Business Strategy from Stanford. 25+ years advising C-suite executives on transformational initiatives.
